cards.title: Wand of Mind [Equipment]
cards.text: Can be used to take one question or key card

cards.title: Mask of Hypnotize [Equipment]
cards.text: Can be used to take one question or key card

cards.title: Token of Teleporation [Equipment]
cards.text: Can be used to move another player or yourself to the desired place

cards.title: Staff of Electricity [Equipment]
cards.text: Can be used to make another player skip a turn

cards.title: Mantle of Invisibility [Equipment]
cards.text: Take $20 off another player

cards.title: Slinger [Equipment]
cards.text: Can be used to make another player skip a turn

cards.title: Mirror of Reflection [Equipment]
cards.text: Returns the equipment effect received to the sender

cards.title: Compass of Truth [Equipment]
cards.text: Can be used to move yourself to the desired space

cards.title: Gloves of Thief [Equipment]
cards.text: Steal $10 off your enemy

cards.title: Fire Bullet [Equipment]
cards.text: Remove a question of another player

cards.title: Boots of Speed [Equipment]
cards.text: Roll again

cards.title: Ball of Smoke [Equipment]
cards.text: Cancel the equipment effect

cards.title: Boots of Evasion [Equipment]
cards.text: Cancel the effect casted on yourself.
